main.bio: Highly accomplished and versatile Engineering and IT professional with a proven history of success in mission-critical environments. As a U.S. Army Veteran and former DoD Civil Servant with an active T3 Secret Clearance, my career has been defined by a commitment to service and ensuring mission success. Seeking a strategic role that leverages my extensive expertise in design, data, engineering, software, and technology to solve highly complex, multi-disciplinary technical challenges and deliver high-impact, transformative results. I've embedded an interactive Power BI dashboard below in the Resume section to provide a dynamic look at my professional experience. Feel free to explore the data below or download a traditional copy of my resume in .pdf or .docx format.
main.contactmessage: I welcome you to contact me to leave feedback or to discuss how I can contribute to your team.
